column5: Topics: Reports, CSV import/export, Promotions, Pricebooks, QR Order & Pay, Beep Delivery, Membership, Engage
Topics: Networking basics, printer troubleshooting (IP addresses, feed tests, printer resets, printer configuration)
35 questions, 80% pass required, open-book. Discuss with trainer before submitting
Demonstrate: Hardware assembly, printer search, feed test, printer reset, configuration, IP troubleshooting. 80% pass required
Internal tools: Intercom, Aircall, supply chain processes
Review instructions and start working (due end of Day 4)
Shadow a senior CSM to understand daily duties. Take detailed notes in Buddy Checklist. Senior will provide feedback on your engagement
Learn what to expect during Mock Test and how scoring works
Focus time to complete and submit by end of day
Mental preparation: Recap role-specific processes and product knowledge
Present your CSM Assessment to your coach. Receive feedback and coaching. Coach completes scoring

PH: BIR Training (study BIR slides)
MY: Mock Preparation (quick recap of Day 1-2 training slides)

2 rounds of roleplay with spontaneous scenarios. This is your final performance assessment (45% of total score!). 

80% pass required
